content.title: Add a TextBox Widget
content.body:
1. From the lower-left corner of Iris, go to the Default Library and click on the search icon .
  2. In the search bar, clear any previous text and enter TextBox.
  3. From the results, select TextBox.
  4. Drag and drop the widget onto the Contact form in the canvas.
  5. From the Project explorer, right-click on the new text box widget and rename txtName.
